Отличная головоломка, возможно даже стоит своих денег) Сам купил за 89 рублей на новогодней распродаже, и был крайне доволен покупкой) Отличный юмор, графика на уровне, единственное, что мне не очень понравилось это уровни с открытыми помещениями, лично мне в них было играть не комфортно, а так однозначно рекомендую!
很好玩，V社的品质毋庸置疑

Orange & Blue. 

Portal 2 continues from the story of Portal: http://store.steampowered.com/app/400/ it also has 2 modes including one of the mascots for Portal 2, a co-op mode, and Solo/Story Mode. 

You begin where you left off (mostly) , with your portal gun. The portal gun fires two colours depending on which side of the mouse you click. if you left-click, you will fire the blue portal, where on the other hand if you right-click, you will then fire the orange portal. If you walk through one of the portals, you will walk out of the other one, if that makes sense.

This game is absolutley epic. Definitley recommend it.
I played it for a while it pretty good

Sranda

Portal 2 es un juego que combina a la perfección las plataformas con los rompecabezas, todo ello bajo el prisma de la perspectiva del shooter en primera persona. Aquellos que disfrutaron de la primera parte encontrarán en Portal 2 un juego maduro, capaz de extraer lo mejor de su primera entrega y alcanzar un sobresaliente nivel del que pocos títulos pueden hacer gala. Valve ha creado un paraíso para el reto intelectual. Un maravilloso mundo de acción y rompecabezas cuyo exquisito estilo acaban por redondear un juego compacto y, por poco, perfecto.

Obra maestra 11/10
interesting

Ох.. ну это очередная головоломка от Valve с их уже довольно продвинутым в плане оптимизации движком Source. Что можно сказать ещё?) Первая часть поведаед об истоках, а здесь скажем так продолжение сего чуда... ну разве что можно отметить шикарное дополнение в виде мультиплеерного режима со своим сюжетом.

一开始我只以为这是个大型益智类游戏
然后突然剧情神转折
再然后各种暗线各种补充背景
最后重逢和逃命，最终boss战都挺出乎意料的，但又能前后呼应
我是万万没想到这个大型益智类游戏能搞出这么酷炫的剧情的（尤其我又是个游戏剧情控，把游戏剧情当小说看的）
甚至还能跟多人模式挂钩并且顺延下去，脑洞满分（可能是因为我没通关的时候就打了双人模式，这个感觉更强烈）
最后结局的时候那段炮塔们的齐奏真的棒，一本满足，特地看了好几遍
Absolutes Muss ... warte auf Teil 3 :)

my first playthrough on portal, and honestly the storyline is okay, too much of one thing or another, the puzzles are interesting, for some it took a few seconds others i had to think about it a few minutes.  but for as complicated as they are the first time around, the second and third playthroughs are going to be more easy due to the way the puzzles are setup in a linear fashion. so while i can praise the portal team for what they did, it also works against them as well by not randomising the puzzle after each playthrough.

The storyline about glados on the early part is so dull: [spoiler]this passive/aggressive one sided arguement drags on and i thought to myself, this machine is vindictive and petty to the point i took the earphones out and just played the game.[/spoiler] 
after a certain amount of missions this changes: [spoiler]Wheatley takes over from Glados before he chucks you down a massive tunnel, after working around a few tunnels there are this prerecorded messages from a familiar voice of J.K. Simmons whom i recognise off The Closer, he plays as Cave Johnson from 30-60 years ago. but towards the end of this part i started getting bored going through science spheres.[/spoiler] 

there are a lot of repetitive parts to this game. but aside from this, the graphics are clean and not too exciting which is what i expect off valve, that isn't a negative comment. sometimes the best type of graphics are the ones that are not overly flashy, i didn't much like the audio either in a lot of ways.

one thing that made it hard to even complete the game was how many times it crashed through the play through, it must of crashed over 30 times which is the most of any game i have played, most of which are during the puzzles and some i had to start over, had to resort to saving the game more regularly to get around it. another thing of note are the loading screens, in the early part of the game i spent more time in loading screens than i did in puzzle action.

i can't really find much positive about portal 2 other than J.K. Simmons voice over.

10/10! As you journey through the massive Aperture facility, it becomes clear that Portal 2 does not merely come after Portal. Instead, it radiates outward from its predecessor, simultaneously illuminating the world that gave rise to Portal and continuing the adventure that began there. The sense of novelty is diminished, but the thrill of exploration and puzzle-solving is still intoxicating, and it's amazing how Portal 2 manages to tell a better story with disembodied voices and spherical robots than most games can with full-on humans. Your return to Aperture Science is a joyful one in this immensely appealing, laugh-out-loud funny, and thoroughly satisfying sequel. Immensely clever writing, new characters are hugely entertaining, and the cooperative campaign creates intriguing situations! The only bad thing about this game that I could come up with would be the frequent load times. Valve cuts no corners and finds ways to make you care about everything from the major characters to the cubes used to solve puzzles. From the beginning of the single-player story to the end of the co-op mode, Portal 2 is a novel, unforgettable experience.

Что первая, что вторая часть это лучшие игры головоломки созданные за всю историю, идеальный геймплей, интересная история, интересные персонажи, отличный юмор, умеренная сложность, до момента с добавлением в игру всяких прыгучих жидкостей, потом уже действительно хардкоре.
Радует наличие комиксов, ШАПОК, КАКАЯ ИГРА ОТ ВАЛВОВ БЕЗ ШАПОК, кооператива, и воркшопа, который ещё на парочку дней вас займёт, к покупке-обязательно.

Отличная игра, где можно с удовольствием потратить свое время. Очень много интересных сцен, где даже можно улыбнуться. Очень своетую эту игру для тех, кто любит подумать. Есть маленькие минус, то что всего лишь 9 глав, эту игру прошел за 6ч, а хотелось бы еще поиграть.

There is a reason why Portal 2 has received universal acclaim.  Portal 2 is quality puzzle game with mentally stimulating test chambers and a unique form of movement using inter-spatial portals.  The story line across the Portal series is crafted well and involves sarcastic AI protagonists.

My favorite parts of the game are the use of physics and momentum to solve problems and an ever changing combination of core game elements (beams, bridges, various types of cubes, gels, turrets, etc) to provide experiments of varying difficulty levels.
un hermoso juego para el que quiere pasar el rato resolviendo puzzles y demas, aparte que el juego si te puede llegar a meter en la historia y eso es my entretenido. pd. el pastel es una mentira ;v
